name: The change
description:
"In this game you can't do whatever you want"

"The change" is not a game. I mean, it is an indie game which wants to set a thought in your mind and in which you will be bound to go only ahead. Look forward. This game is a third person. Without 2018 graphics, indeed, but which wants to impress by words. Listen to me and discover the message behind the game.

"The change" is more like a story. A story which needs to be understood.
When you'll buy this game, don't expect a very long gameplay, as this is my first game. I will grow along with my games.
